about_the_game:
Hewwo, I'm Pâquerette! ⊂(◉‿◉✿)つ
I will be your guide in Horribunnies, teaching you how to take the UTMOST care of your bunnies so they'll all be super happy (and you too!) :3
Our bunnies need to be fed, groomed, petted, and cleaned D-A-I-L-Y, but most importantly... they need to be loved! (灬♥ω♥灬)
I will be watching you practice on my own bun-bun, Moko, before I leave you in charge of the store's hutches – no pressure, I swear! :p

Add to your wishlist now to stay updated on these buns' development!



There are many reasons why you should be playing Horribunnies!!
  • Bond with the cutest virtual bunnies you've ever seen. They come in all shapes and sizes but require the same amount of petting!
  • Put up some of your bunnies for adoption so you can focus more on your favorites. :3
  • Get food, equipment, and cosmetics for your buns so they'll be as happy as bunnily possible!!
  • Traits are inherited genetically, so breed responsibly!
  • Everything is as flashy and sweet as it gets, from lovely graphics to sugary music... You're guaranteed to melt with joy!
  • ... and much more we have yet to announce U( ÒㅅÓ)U
detailed_description:
Add Horribunnies to your wishlist!


About the Demo



Hewwo, I'm Pâquerette! ⊂(◉‿◉✿)つ
I will be your guide in Horribunnies, teaching you how to take the UTMOST care of your bunnies so they'll all be super happy (and you too!) :3
Our bunnies need to be fed, groomed, petted, and cleaned D-A-I-L-Y, but most importantly... they need to be loved! (灬♥ω♥灬)
I will be watching you practice on my own bun-bun, Moko, before I leave you in charge of the store's hutches – no pressure, I swear! :p

Add to your wishlist now to stay updated on these buns' development!



There are many reasons why you should be playing Horribunnies!!
  • Bond with the cutest virtual bunnies you've ever seen. They come in all shapes and sizes but require the same amount of petting!
  • Put up some of your bunnies for adoption so you can focus more on your favorites. :3
  • Get food, equipment, and cosmetics for your buns so they'll be as happy as bunnily possible!!
  • Traits are inherited genetically, so breed responsibly!
  • Everything is as flashy and sweet as it gets, from lovely graphics to sugary music... You're guaranteed to melt with joy!
  • ... and much more we have yet to announce U( ÒㅅÓ)U
name: Horribunnies Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ - 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Horribunnies, you get to pet, raise, and genetically engineer cute bwunnies~~ Will your bunny business become the sweetest or the most profitable?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
